Package ohos.wearable.tile

Class TileAbility

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.app.AbilityContext
      • ohos.aafwk.ability.Ability
        • ohos.wearable.tile.TileAbility

  • public abstract class TileAbility
extends ohos.aafwk.ability.Ability
    Tile applications implement this abstraction ability to build their own tile providers.
    Since:
    4

    • Field Detail

      • ACTION_REQUEST_UPDATE

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_REQUEST_UPDATE
        The tile service invokes notifyDataChanged(ohos.app.Context,ohos.bundle.ElementName) to request the tile management module to update the data of the specified tile ID. notifyDataChanged(ohos.app.Context,ohos.bundle.ElementName) broadcasts the ACTION_REQUEST_UPDATE event to the tile management module.

        The tile service does not need to use this field to process related services.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_TILE

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_TILE
        The tile service needs to declare this action in the config file to notify the tile management side that a tile is implemented. The tile management module identifies ACTION_TILE and adds the tile to the tile selection list.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_TILE_DEFAULT

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_TILE_DEFAULT
        If you want to add tiles to the visible tile list before delivery, you need to declare ACTION_TILE_DEFAULT in the config file. When browsing tiles in tile management, users can directly browse the tiles under the tile service.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_CLASS_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_CLASS_NAME
        The tile service's class name.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_PACKAGE_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_PACKAGE_NAME
        The tile service's package name.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_TILE_IDS

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_TILE_IDS
        The tile service invokes notifyDataChanged(ohos.app.Context,ohos.bundle.ElementName) to request the tile management module to update the data of a specified tile ID. The tile management module sends the specified tile ID to the tile management module in extra mode. The tile management module parses the tile ID based on this field.

        The tile service does not need to use this field to process related services.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
